# Crypto staking

![mina](https://assets.kraken.com/marketing/web/icons/sym-mina_colored.svg)

### Mina

### staking

(MINA)

12-18% APY

# Earn 12-18% by staking Mina (MINA)

Staking Mina lets you earn rewards on your MINA holdings while helping to
secure the Mina network. Create a Kraken account to stake your MINA and earn
12-18% APY.

[Sign up](/sign-up?rfr=pro-web)

[Sign up](https://krakenpro.app.link/2MPaEYajHFb)

## How to stake Mina

## How to stake Mina

In just a few steps, you can start staking your MINA in the Kraken mobile app
or on the web.

Create your free Kraken account

Buy or deposit MINA

Stake your MINA to earn up to 12-18% APY

[Sign up](https://krakenpro.app.link/2MPaEYajHFb)

[Sign up](/sign-up?rfr=pro-web)

## Why stake MINA with Kraken

##### Fast. Easy. No minimums.

Stake any amount of MINA in minutes

##### Exchange integration

One login for staking, buying, selling and trading MINA

##### World-class security

Your funds remain safe with Kraken, the secure digital asset exchange

### Learn more about Mina

#### [How to buy Mina](/learn/buy-mina-mina)

Learn how to buy Mina easily and safely through Kraken.

cryptocurrencies. Kraken offers instant trades and reliable uptime on over 200
Mina trading pairs.

## FAQ

## Mina staking FAQ:

  1. ### Can I convert MINA to USD?

You can easily convert MINA to USD by taking the price of Mina multiplied by
the number of MINA tokens you hold. See our [Mina
converter](/convert/mina/usd) for details.

  2. ### What is proof of stake?

Proof of Stake is a consensus algorithm that uses cryptocurrency tokens and
network incentives to keep a blockchain secure. On a Proof of Stake blockchain
like Mina, MINA tokens are staked in order to make network validators eligible
to verify transactions and incentivize their honest behavior. The amount of
MINA a validator stakes is directly proportional to the likelihood that they
will be chosen to validate the transaction, with some degree of randomness.
Those chosen to verify a transaction on a Proof-of-Stake blockchain like Mina
are rewarded with MINA.

  3. ### Can I stake MINA using my hardware wallet?

It is not possible to stake Mina on Kraken using your hardware wallet. If you
already have MINA in a hardware wallet, you can easily transfer it to Kraken’s
secure staking platform.

  4. ### How do I run a Mina validator node?

Running a Mina validator node is a technically complex and costly process
which requires a significant amount of resources. Because many feel the
investment in running a Mina node is too great, they often choose to stake
their MINA using an easy and secure service like Kraken.

  5. ### What is the difference between on-chain and off-chain staking?

While similar in name and design on our client interface, on-chain and off-
chain staking are separate features. On-chain staking utilizes assets “On-
chain” in Proof-of-Stake protocols such as Mina. Off-chain staking utilizes
assets “Off-chain” (as further described in our Terms of Service). You can
view your eligibility for Off-chain staking
[here](https://support.kraken.com/hc/en-us/articles/360044886531-Off-chain-
staking-eligibility-and-availability).
